description:
Rose finally tracks down her ultimate target, the man responsible for the death of her adopted father. Despite Sorey`s efforts to stop her, Rose leaps in for the kill.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: Justice at Hand Rather Than Ideal Beyond One`s Reach
La justice ici plutôt que l`idéal au loin
Todokanai Risou yori Me no Mae no Seigi
届かない理想より目の前の正義 Justice at Hand rather than Ideal beyond One`s Reach
닿을 수 없는 이상보다 눈앞의 정의
